languages.text: {n}Голос Авеля начинает вибрировать, а взгляд — метаться по углам, лишь бы не встречаться с вашим.{/n} "Уязвленное было отформатировано... Но тени охоты не избыты... Шестерня соскочила, суждение не вынесено... Отсутствие суждения — угроза. Кто вынесет суждение?"

{n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Авеля начинает вибрировать, а взгляд — метаться по углам, лишь бы не встречаться с вашим.{/n} "Уязвленное было отформатировано... Но тени охоты не избыты... Шестерня соскочила, суждение не вынесено... Отсутствие суждения — угроза. Кто вынесет суждение?"

languages.text: {n}亚伯的声音颤抖着，目光四处张望，拼命避免与任何人目光接触。{/n}“缺陷之物已经得到了清除……但狩猎的阴影挥之不去……齿轮被卸下来了，没有任何判断……在缺乏判断的情况下，威胁仍然存在。谁会进行判断呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯的声音颤抖着，目光四处张望，拼命避免与任何人目光接触。{/n}“缺陷之物已经得到了清除……但狩猎的阴影挥之不去……齿轮被卸下来了，没有任何判断……在缺乏判断的情况下，威胁仍然存在。谁会进行判断呢？”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}アベルの声は震えている。彼の視線は素早く動きまわっており、必死に目が合うのを避けているようだ。{/n}「不備は解消された…しかし狩りの影がまだ残っています…歯車は分解され、何の判決も下されていない…何の判決もなければ、脅威はまだそこにある。誰が判決を下す？」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルの声は震えている。彼の視線は素早く動きまわっており、必死に目が合うのを避けているようだ。{/n}「不備は解消された…しかし狩りの影がまだ残っています…歯車は分解され、何の判決も下されていない…何の判決もなければ、脅威はまだそこにある。誰が判決を下す？」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Abel frémit et ses yeux regardent en tous sens, en évitant désespérément de croiser les vôtres.{/n} « Ce qui était défectueux a été expurgé... Mais les ombres de la chasse persistent... Le pignon a été démonté et aucun jugement n'a été prononcé... En l'absence de jugement, la menace demeure. Qui prononcera le jugement ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Abel frémit et ses yeux regardent en tous sens, en évitant désespérément de croiser les vôtres.{/n} « Ce qui était défectueux a été expurgé... Mais les ombres de la chasse persistent... Le pignon a été démonté et aucun jugement n'a été prononcé... En l'absence de jugement, la menace demeure. Qui prononcera le jugement ? »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}La voz de Abel tiembla y mira a todos lados esforzándose al máximo por evitar el contacto visual.{/n} «Los errores se han purgado... Pero las sombras de la cacería permanecen... El engranaje se ha desmontado y no se ha llevado a cabo ningún juicio... En ausencia de este, el peligro acecha. ¿Quién realizará el juicio ahora?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Abel tiembla y mira a todos lados esforzándose al máximo por evitar el contacto visual.{/n} «Los errores se han purgado... Pero las sombras de la cacería permanecen... El engranaje se ha desmontado y no se ha llevado a cabo ningún juicio... En ausencia de este, el peligro acecha. ¿Quién realizará el juicio ahora?».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abels Stimme zittert. Seine Augen zucken, als würde er verzweifelt versuchen, jeden Augenkontakt zu vermeiden.{/n} "Was makelbehaftet war, wurde gereinigt ... Doch die Schatten der Jagd klingen nach ... Das Zahnrad wurde entfernt und es wurde kein Urteil getroffen ... In Abwesenheit des Urteils bleibt die Gefahr bestehen. Wer wird das Urteil fällen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abels Stimme zittert. Seine Augen zucken, als würde er verzweifelt versuchen, jeden Augenkontakt zu vermeiden.{/n} "Was makelbehaftet war, wurde gereinigt ... Doch die Schatten der Jagd klingen nach ... Das Zahnrad wurde entfernt und es wurde kein Urteil getroffen ... In Abwesenheit des Urteils bleibt die Gefahr bestehen. Wer wird das Urteil fällen?"
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel'in sesi titriyor, gözleri de sürekli başka yöne çevrilerek diğer gözlerle temas kurmaktan itinayla kaçınıyor.{/n} "Kusurlu olan arındırıldı. Avın gölgeleriyse dağılmış değil. Dişli söküldü ama herhangi bir hüküm verilmedi. Hükümsüzlük ötürü tehdit hâlâ mevcut. Hükmü kim verecek?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's voice quivers, and his eyes dart around, desperately avoiding eye contact.{/n} "What was flawed has since been purged... But the shadows of the hunt linger... The cog is dismounted, and no judgement has been made... In the absence of judgement, threat remains. Who will make the judgement?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel'in sesi titriyor ve gözleri sürekli başka yöne hareketlenerek diğer gözlerle temas kurmaktan itinayla kaçınıyor.{/n} "Kusurlu olan arındırıldı. Avın gölgeleri ise hâlâ orada. Dişli söküldü ve herhangi bir hüküm verilmedi. Hükümsüzlük durumunda tehdit hâlâ mevcut. Hükmü kim verecek?"
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
